Name: Name Change, Harriet Ross Tubman Avenue, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to the renaming of Fulton street, Borough of Brooklyn, so that it shall hereafter be known as Harriet Ross Tubman Avenue and to amending the official map of the City of New York accordingly.

History.Description: This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

 
Section 1. Fulton street in the Borough of Brooklyn is hereby renamed as indicated:
 
New Name	Present Name	Limits	
Harriet Ross Tubman Avenue	Fulton Street	between Boerum Place and Rockaway Boulevard	
 
§2. The official map of the city of New York shall be amended in accordance with the provisions of section one of this local law.
§3. This local law shall take effect immediately upon its enactment into law. 


 
 
 
JH 
6/24/04
